name: Roy Coleman
description: I like history, art. I like to spend time on the beach..Intelligence isvery important for me. I like to cook (every day meal and special mealfor two of us or big family and friends party), watch movies, have agood time at home in front of fireplace or on the patio, but in the sametime (maybe even more) I like to travel, dance, visit museums, paks,art galeries live theatres (opera and ballet included).the I am lookingfor a good, intelligent gentle woman, who enjoys music, and easyconversation. Enjoys quite places but also likes to go out on the town. Iadmire a woman who treasures family and friends, someone who will go outof their way to “be there” for the important people in his lifes!!Lovethe outdoors, love camping, fishing and most anything to do with theoutdoors, vibrant, smart, Love most music, like most movies but romanceand horror are good!!a walk by the water and perhaps a picnic
